sentences.sContent: Diets are most effective when combined with exercise.
sentences.sCn: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.sContent: Ruth hesitated, uncertain of how to combine honesty and diplomacy in her answer.
sentences.sCn: 露丝犹豫了，她不知道怎样回答才能既诚实又婉转。

sentences.sContent: Good carpet wool needs to combine softness with strength.
sentences.sCn: 优质的地毯羊毛需要兼备柔性和韧性。

sentences.sContent: ...His great achievement was to combine an emotional spark with computer technology...
...they also combine words to make meaningful sentences in ways that are unique...

remMethod.val: com(共同) ＋ bi(两个) ＋ ne → 使两个在一起 → 结合

words.tran: 结合的；可结合的；有结合力的
结合；组合；联合；[化学] 化合
使结合；联合（combine的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together
